content: for 20 sts in total 10 sts on each needle graft toe using the kitchener stitch i like this method to prevent the „ears from forming weave in the ends and you re done please tag me if you decide to share your finished creation i m @crochetedbybogusia on instagram and yes my main things is crocheting - don t be alarmed charts colorwork chart right sock @crochetedbybogusia @crochetedbybogusia charts colorwork chart left sock @crochetedbybogusia charts texture chart a right sock for the right sock we want to make 2/2 lc left twisting cable if you don t have a cable needle or don t want to use it this video shows you a way to knit cables without cable needle i like the second method shown there texture chart a left sock for the left sock we want to make 2/2 rc right twisting cable @crochetedbybogusia charts texture chart b back of the sock @crochetedbybogusia
